channel.title: Need code for RuneCrafting, I have the informations
channel.description:
Ok so I want to add the Runecrafting skill to my server. The only altars I want people teled to are: air, water, earth, fire, mind, body, law, nature and chaos. With this, I want these names into a screen when you talk to the NPC and you can chose the rune. I will give you the coordinates where the player must be teleported to, when clicking the choise of the rune:
X , Y
Air: 2845 , 4832 Water: 2713 , 4836 Earth: 2660 , 4839 Fire: 2584 , 4836
HERE A "More..." BUTTON WHICH WILL GO THE NEXT CHOISES:
Mind: 2796 , 4818 Body: 2527 , 4833 Law: 2464 , 4834 Nature: 2398 , 4841 Chaos: 2269 , 4843
Ok so that are the coordinates I want the altar choises teleport the player to. And the NPC I want to say this is [ID] "2753".
I hope someone can make this for me, I am really unexperienced with java coding. Also, can you tell me to which file I need to add the code? I guess "npchandler.java"?
Thanks ALOT if you help me with this!
- Refive

are you using a PI project insanity?

item.title: Need code for RuneCrafting, I have the informations
item.dc:creator: @Refive Refive
item.description:
@Refive wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Good thing you have the “informations”! You just need to add the Dialogue and edit the Interface packets.

Can’t you make the code for me? Or explain what I exactly need to do?

Thanks -

item.title: Need code for RuneCrafting, I have the informations

item.description:
@Refive wrote:

Ok so I want to add the Runecrafting skill to my server. The only altars I want people teled to are: air, water, earth, fire, mind, body, law, nature and chaos. With this, I want these names into a screen when you talk to the NPC and you can chose the rune.
I will give you the coordinates where the player must be teleported to, when clicking the choise of the rune:

X , Y

Air: 2845 , 4832
Water: 2713 , 4836
Earth: 2660 , 4839
Fire: 2584 , 4836

HERE A “More…” BUTTON WHICH WILL GO THE NEXT CHOISES:

Body: 2527 , 4833
Law: 2464 , 4834
Nature: 2398 , 4841
Chaos: 2269 , 4843

Ok so that are the coordinates I want the altar choises teleport the player to.
